articles.title: WPK Conference to Be Convened
articles.content:
WPK Conference to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 18 issued the following decision on convening the WPK Conference:
					 The Party members, servicepersons and all other Korean people are now dynamically pushing forward the grand advance to glorify 2012 as a year of proud victory to be recorded in the annals of the country, single-mindedly united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, cherishing the steadfast faith that general secretary Kim Jong Il will always be with them.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and an invincible revolutionary party with his outstanding ideas and theories and extraordinary leadership and successfully led the Korean revolution with warm love for the country and its people, fervent energy and great dedication for over half a century, thus performing undying revolutionary feats in behalf of the Party, the revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 We are now facing honorable tasks to build a thriving socialist nation by firmly defending the revolutionary ideas and line and undying revolutionary feats of the President and Kim Jong Il and successfully materializing them without an inch of deflection under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the head of the WPK and the revolution for all ages.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee decides to convene the WPK Conference in mid-April Juche 101 (2012) to glorify the sacred revolutionary life and feats of Kim Jong Il for all ages and accomplish the Juche cause, the Songun revolutionary cause, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: CFRK Warns S. Korean Warmongers of Merciless Punishment
articles.content:
CFRK Warns S. Korean Warmongers of Merciless Punishment
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Sunday issued information bulletin No. 990 in connection with the plan of the south Korean warmongers to stage a grave military provocation against the DPRK again in the West Sea of Korea.
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The enemy side keen on the moves for a war against the DPRK appeared at Panmunjom on Feb. 19 and notified over loudspeaker that it would stage a live shell firing drill targeted against the waters of the DPRK side from Paekryong, Yonphyong and other islands in the West Sea from 10:30 a.m. on Feb. 20.
					
					 This is a very dangerous play with fire to ignite a war against the north as it is a clear declaration of war against it.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers announced their plan to stage the above-said drill targeted against the waters of the DPRK side again in the wake of their open declaration of the projected large-scale joint military exercises like Key Resolve at a time when the Korean people are still grieving over the big loss to the nation. This fully revealed their true colors as ferocious war maniacs.
					
					 Worse still, the puppet group is going to perpetrate such military provocation with U.S. imperialist aggression forces involved after inviting even an international observers group. Lurking behind this scenario are sinister aims to justify their moves for a war against the north, make the existence of the illegal "northern limit line" an established fact, escalate the military tension and draw public attention to it in a bid to reverse the unfavorable trend of the situation with the approach of the election.
					
					 This is the last-ditch effort of the Lee Myung Bak group to get rid of the abyss of ruin into which it has been thrown by the total failure of its domestic and foreign policies and the people's rebuff.
					
					 The projected saber-rattling of the U.S. and the puppet warmongers more clearly proves who is the wrecker of peace on the Korean Peninsula and the arch criminal responsible for the escalating tension and the deterioration of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The enemies try to judge our reaction through this military provocation but the answer to them is clear. 
					
					 If the puppet warmongers preempt reckless firing despite our warning, they will not escape punishment thousands-fold severer than the past Yonphyong Island shelling.
					
					 It will also lead to a complete collapse of the inter-Korean relations and invite the most miserable self-destruction of the puppet group.
					
					 The issue of how the situation on the Korean Peninsula will develop will entirely depend on the U.S. and the puppet group.
					
					 We remain unperturbed in face of any declaration of war and should they come in attack on us, we will beat them.
					
					 We are fully prepared for both a local and total war.
					
					 The provokers will have to pay a dear price for it.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Huichon Power Stations
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Learns about Huichon Power Stations
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim on Feb. 18 and 19 acquainted himself with the work at Huichon Power Stations on the spot.
					 Huichon Power Stations Nos. 1 and 2 which were built in a short span of time at a new speed of Chollima, Huichon speed under the wise leadership of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un, entered into test operation in order to supply electricity to different fields of national economy.
					
					 Choe, together with officials concerned, looked round various places including generator rooms, to learn in detail about the modernization of electric power network and production of electricity at the power stations.
					
					 Referring to the important role played by the power stations in settling the issue of electricity urgently needed for building a thriving nation, he underscored the need to put the production of electricity on a normal footing through a proper operation of equipment and technical management.
					
					 He underlined the need to take decisive measures for increasing at maximum the production capacity at the existing power stations and reducing the loss of electricity in transmission in the field of power industry.

articles.title: Gift from Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Gift from Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Brazilian Centre for Peace and Solidarity with Peoples on his 70th birth anniversary.
					 Socorro Gomes, chairwoman of the Centre, conveyed the gift to Ri Hwa Gun, DPRK ambassador to Brazil, on February 15.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception to Commemorate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception to Commemorate Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, arranged a reception at his embassy on Monday to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and others.
					
					 The ambassador said at the reception that the pains taken by Kim Jong Il for the socialist cause would be always kept in the hearts of the world revolutionaries.
					
					 The wise leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un serves as the source of all victories to the DPRK, he stressed.
					
					 We heartily hope that the Korean people would open the gate to a thriving nation this year marking the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and reliably defend their country and socialism, the ambassador said.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam in his speech said that the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il was the brilliant one of a great man who adorned the protracted course of the Juche revolution, the Songun revolution with victory and glory with his unbounded loyalty to the idea and the cause of the President.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Un is showing deep care for the development of the friendly and cooperative relations with Cuba, true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people will steadily consolidate the bonds of militant friendship and cooperation based on the revolutionary principle and comradely obligation in the future, too, he said.

articles.title: Grand Performance Commemorating Day of Shining Star Given before Full House
articles.content:
Grand Performance Commemorating Day of Shining Star Given before Full House
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A grand performance "We Will Be Loyal Down through Generations" commemorating general secretary Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary is given before full house in Pyongyang everyday.
					 The performers impressively represented the ardent yearning of all service personnel and people for Kim Jong Il in mixed duet and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", dance and chorus for trumpet solo "Attraction and Reverence", female solo and Pangchang "The General's Footsteps", chorus "Reverence Is Boundless" and other numbers.
					
					  Narration and music "The DPRK Advances Shoulder to Shoulder", chorus "Footsteps" and chorus and tap dance "Let DPRK Advance" and other numbers reflected unshakable faith and will to inherit the footsteps of the Korean revolution which started on Mt. Paektu as the footsteps of victory of Songun Korea.
					
					 Officials of armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel, officials in the fields of literature and art and the press, creators, artistes, journalists and mediamen enjoyed the performance. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Festival Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Festival Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel of the People's Army, people from all walks of life, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreigners are visiting the venue of the 16th Kimjongilia Festival on the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 At least 400,000 people have visited the festival venue so far.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Projected U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Projected U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces are going to stage again provocative joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle. This saber-rattling will also involve a large scale Ssangryong joint landing drill.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The announcement of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle clearly proves that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are the wrecker of peace and the arch criminal escalating the tensions on the Korean Peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. military presence and domination over south Korea are the main source of military confrontation and tensions on the peninsula and a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The ceaseless joint military exercises which the south Korean conservative group is staging together with outsiders are a clear manifestation of their invariable ambition to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The joint military exercises projected by it at a time when the Korean people are still grieving over their great loss are acts of treachery unimaginable for the Koreans.
					
					 It is entirely thanks to the powerful war deterrent built by the DPRK and its firm will to defend peace that no war has broken out despite reckless saber-rattling on the part of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.
					
					 If the war-like forces at home and abroad ignite a war, misjudging the DPRK's will for defending peace, they will perish in the flames kindled by themselves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant Grave
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant Grave
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese defense minister was reported recently to have begged his U.S. counterpart to render cooperation in Japan's efforts to deploy ultramodern stealth fighter F-35 in Japan as planned.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary:
					
					 The ulterior intention of Japan is to realize its wild ambition to emerge a military giant and launch overseas expansion at any cost with the help of its American master.
					
					 Japan has worked hard overtly and covertly to realize its sinister scenario for legalizing the SDF's overseas military operation, etc. under the pretext of "cooperation with the U.S." 
					
					 The SDF is now set to expand its operational sphere to vast areas of the Asia-Pacific region and acquire the capability of undertaking any combat action, single-handed. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seek to take the initiative in the Asia-Pacific region, a region of strategic importance where the interests of powers are intertwined. 
					
					 In case this scenario of Japan becomes a reality, Asia will be exposed to overseas aggression to be launched by a new militarist war state.
					
					 Herein lies the serious and dangerous nature of the Japanese reactionaries' moves to turn their country into a military giant as exemplified by the induction of F-35 into the Air "Self-Defence Force."
					
					 Watching for a chance to take revenge for the defeat, the Japanese reactionaries are keen to revive the appearance of empire, staking their destiny on becoming a military giant.
					
					 But it is a daydream of Japan to realize its shameless wild ambition for emerging a military giant, backed by the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Arrest Protesters against Construction of Naval Base
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Arrest Protesters against Construction of Naval Base
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police walked off Rev. Mun Jong Hyon and other 13 persons during its rude crackdown on those who took part in a demo against the construction of naval base on Jeju Island, according to CBS on Saturday. 
					 The demonstrators, consisting of members of various organizations, put up placards outside the construction site to demand the halt to construction. 
					
					 Enraged at the police's crackdown, they blocked the police truck carrying the arrested persons and stubbornly battled for hours.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Commemorates Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Commemorates Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Sakhalin Region and Kamchatka Territory of Russia held a seminar on feats and round table-talks on February 16, the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the events were officials of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, the United Confederation of Koreans in Sakhalin Region, the Association of Korean Nationals in Kamchatka Territory and the United Confederation of Koreans in Kamchatka Territory and compatriots.
					
					 They presented baskets of flowers to the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Jang Sun Jong, chairperson of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, said that Kim Jong Il is a distinguished Songun commander as he fully displayed the dignity of the country and the nation and made great contributions to world peace and security.
					
					 His undying feats will shine forever, the chairperson said, adding that the Koreans in Russia will strive for the country's reunification and prosperity under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Ri Chae Son, chairperson of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kamchatka Territory, lauded Kim Jong Il, finding himself on a train for the people's happiness and sharing sweets and bitters with them all his life, provided the present prosperity and ushered in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 On the same day Koreans in Uzbekistan held a similar event at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent.

articles.title: Iran Not to Stop Manufacture of Centrifuges
articles.content:
Iran Not to Stop Manufacture of Centrifuges
 Moscow, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Iranian ambassador to Russia in a press conference on February 16 clarified his country's stand not to stop the manufacture of centrifuges.
					 The Iranian government is ready to have talks on the nuclear issue, but can not accept the demand for halt to activity related to the centrifuges, he said.
					
					 He held that talks should be resumed without precondition.
					
					 If the U.S. attacks Iran its people would utilize all means to cope with it, he warned.

articles.title: Pakistani President Pledges Support for Iran against Foreign Aggression
articles.content:
Pakistani President Pledges Support for Iran against Foreign Aggression
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari pledged support for Iran if it is invaded by foreign forces.
					 The president made the pledge during his meeting with the visiting Iranian president who arrived in Islamabad on Thursday.
					
					 He told Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad that Pakistan will not provide base to the United States if it intends to attack Iran and it will support Iran against any foreign aggression.

articles.title: 7 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in Northwest Pakistan
articles.content:
7 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in Northwest Pakistan
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan have continued to make air strikes on Pakistan under the signboard of "anti-terrorism".
					 At least seven people were killed and seven others injured in a U.S. drone strike launched in Miranshah, Pakistan's northwest tribal area of North Waziristan, on Thursday morning.

articles.title: Iran Cuts Oil Exports to Six EU Countries
articles.content:
Iran Cuts Oil Exports to Six EU Countries
 Tehran, February 19 (KCNA) -- Iran has cut oil exports to six European Union (EU) countries, the local satellite Press TV reported Wednesday.
					 In response to the latest sanctions imposed by the EU against Iran's energy and banking sectors, the Islamic republic has cut oil exports to six European countries, the report said.

articles.title: Renegotiation on FTA Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Renegotiation on FTA Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking the Conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement held a rally in Seoul on Feb. 18 opposing the FTA, according to CBS of south Korea. 
					 The organization said that if the FTA takes effect, the right to existence of the people including workers, peasants and small and medium traders will be ruined. 
					
					 It urged halt to effectuation of the humiliating FTA and start of the renegotiations on it. 
					
					 We will hold rallies demanding stop to the effectuation of the FTA across south Korea all at once on Feb. 25, it declared.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Japan
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Juche idea was held in Osaka, Japan on Feb. 11 to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were delegates of Juche idea study organizations from across Japan.
					
					 The floor was taken by Masaji Ie, adviser of the National Liaison Council of the Japan Society for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works, Satsio Nakato, professor at Ritsumeikan University, and others at the seminar.
					
					 The speakers referred to the undying Songun leadership feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il. The Korean people are bringing about a leap forward in building a thriving nation true to his behests, they noted.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Participants in Meeting of WFTU
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Participants in Meeting of WFTU
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions (WFTU) held in South Africa on Feb. 9 and 10 expressed boundless reverence for general secretary Kim Jong Il and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people.
					 Before the inaugural meeting, George Mavrikos, general secretary of the WFTU, said that the untimely demise of Kim Jong Il in December last year was a great loss not only to the Korean people but to the world people and other working people.
					
					 At his proposal, the participants in the meeting observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Delegates of Vietnam, Syria, Iran, India, Nepal, Peru and other countries expressed deep condolences to the Korean people and other working people over his demise.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Kim Jong Un represents a banner of victory and glory and the center of eternal unity of Songun Korea, the letter said, adding he is fully identical to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The President gave an origin of the Korean working-class movement during his early revolutionary activities against Japanese imperialism and founded the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea right after the liberation of Korea, clearly indicating the way to be followed by the federation and wisely leading it, the letter noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the activities of the federation at its every step, clarified the mission and tasks of the Korean working class in the struggle against imperialism and paid deep attention to solidarity and cooperation with the WFTU, it said.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health for the world peace and security and the victory in the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The meeting also adopted a letter of solidarity to the Korean people and other working people on the occasion of the centenary of birth of the President and the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The letter extended firm support and solidarity to the Korean people and other working people, hoping that they would register great achievements in building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Feats Will Always Be Remembered by Progressive Mankind
articles.content:
Feats Will Always Be Remembered by Progressive Mankind
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on Feb. 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Visiting the DPRK several times, I came to know a lot about Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, and deeply respect him, the director-general said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il set a worldwide model in the issue of the position and role of the leader.
					
					 He passed away but his feats will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, in a statement on the same day noted that Kim Jong Il is the great leader who performed the undying feats for the Korean revolution and the accomplishment of the world socialist cause.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt extends invariable support and encouragement to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people's just cause, he added.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bangladesh, Hungary, Bulgaria, Iceland and Romania on Feb. 12 and 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in their venues were photos of his undying Songun feats and books and photos of Songun Korea.
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, Khaleq Zaman Bhuiyan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as a great master of ideas and theories who clearly indicated the way to independence.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the DPRK has emerged political, ideological and military, scientific and technological power and proudly ranked itself among nuclear weapons states and the Korean People's Army has grown to be a matchless army, they stressed.
					
					 It is thanks to his Songun politics that the DPRK has firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation despite all sanctions and pressures of the imperialists, they added.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said that Kim Jong Il was not only the great leader of the Korean people but the political elder and distinguished leader recognized by the world. 
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said he could not repress sorrow over the too early passing of Kim Jong Il, a great man.
					
					  We will always extend support to the Korean people in their dynamic struggle to reunify the country and build a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Hungary and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Publicada convocatoria de la Conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Publicada convocatoria de la Conferencia del PTC
 Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) publico el dia 18 la siguiente resolucion sobre la convocatoria de la Conferencia del PTC:
					 Hoy en dia, todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes, unidos monoliticamente en torno al estimado Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, aceleran la gran marcha para coronar el ano 2012 como el de victorias enorgullecedoras a registrarse en los anales de la patria con la inconmovible conviccion de que el gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il vive siempre en nosotros.
					
					 Durante mas de medio siglo, con sus extraordinarios pensamientos y teorias y destacada direccion, Kim Jong Il convirtio el PTC en el del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la invencible organizacion revolucionaria.
					
					 Y realizo inmortales hazanas revolucionarias ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo al conducir a la senda de victorias la Revolucion Coreana trabajando con calido amor por la patria y el pueblo, incomparable pasion e inmensa abnegacion.
					
					 Hoy en dia, tenemos la tarea honrosa de construir un Estado prospero socialista al defender resueltamente y materializar consecuentemente la ideologia, lineas e inmortales hazanas revolucionarias de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il enalteciendo siempre a este al frente del partido y la revolucion y siguiendo la direccion de Kim Jong Un.
					
					 El Buro Politico del CC del PTC resuelve convocar a mediados de abril del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche la Conferencia del PTC para glorificar eternamente la sagrada vida revolucionaria e imperecederas proezas revolucionarias de Kim Jong Il y llevar a feliz termino la causa del Juche, la revolucionaria del Songun, uniendose compactamente en torno a Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: EPC envia aviso abierto al circulo militar surcoreano
articles.content:
EPC envia aviso abierto al circulo militar surcoreano
 Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano intentan desarrollar el dia 20 los ejercicios de fuego naval hacia las aguas jurisdiccionales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en los alrededores de las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea, la comandancia del frente occidental del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 19 el siguiente aviso abierto:
					 Tal intento de los belicistas surcoreanos constituye una premeditada provocacion militar encaminada a mantener a toda costa esa ilegal e ilegitima "linea de limite al Norte" y llevar al umbral de guerra la situacion general de la Peninsula Coreana al agravar al maximo la ya bastante tensa situacion de dicha zona maritima.
					
					 Ante la situacion dada, la comandancia del frente occidental del Ejercito Popular de Corea avisa bajo la autorizacion como sigue:
					
					 Las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC en el Mar Oeste de Corea son la zona donde ella ejerce dignamente su soberania.
					
					 Si se inicia la provocacion militar de los traidores surcoreanos contra la polemica zona sobrepasando la sagrada linea de demarcacion maritima de la RPDC y se observa una sola espiral de agua en las zonas maritimas jurisdiccionales de ella, comenzara en el acto el implacable golpe de respuesta de la RPDC.
					
					 Por lo tanto, todos los civiles que habitan o se ganan la vida en las 5 islas del Mar Oeste y sus periferias, deberan evacuarse a los lugares seguros antes de las 9 del dia 20 cuando se iniciara el provocativo fuego naval de los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano.
					
					 La camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak no debe olvidar la leccion del incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong ocurrido el 23 de noviembre de 2010.

articles.title: CRPP advierte al Sur de Corea por su provocacion militar en Mar Oeste
articles.content:
CRPP advierte al Sur de Corea por su provocacion militar en Mar Oeste
 Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 19 la informacion no. 990 en relacion con que los belicistas surcoreanos intentan cometer otra vez en el Mar Oeste de Corea una grave provocacion militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 El texto del documento sigue:
					
					 La parte enemiga, que recurre freneticamente a las maniobras de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC,  anuncio el dia 19 a traves de una altavoz instalada en Phanmunjom que desarrollaria desde las 10:30 de la manana del dia 20 los ejercicios de fuego de artilleria hacia las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC en los alrededores de las islas Paekryong, Yonphyong y otras del Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					 Esto es una evidente declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC y aventura muy peligrosa para atizar el fuego de la guerra.
					
					 Aun antes de que el pueblo coreano se recuperara de la inmensa tristeza proveniente del gran duelo nacional, Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos anunciaron abiertamente el desarrollo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura como "Key Resolve" e intentan ahora volver a abrir fuego hacia la zona maritima de la RPDC, lo cual muestra claramente la verdadera naturaleza de ellos como maniacos de guerra.
					
					 Para colmo, los titeres surcoreanos pretenden cometer esa provocacion militar con la participacion de los uniformados agresores norteamericanos y hasta de un grupo internacional de visita.
					
					 Eso parte de su siniestra intencion de justificar sus maniobras belicas anti-RPDC, hacer valer la ilegal e ilegitima "linea de limite al Norte" y distraer la atencion de opinion publica a las tensiones militares para cambiar a su favor las desfavorables perspectivas de las inminentes elecciones.
					
					 Pero, esto no pasa de ser el ultimo coletazo de la banda de Lee Myung Bak que se encuentra en la agonia por el fracaso de su politica interior y exterior y el repudio de la poblacion.
					
					 La aventura militar de esta vez de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos muestra claramente quien es el perturbador de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, el agravador de la tension y el autor del empeoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Los enemigos pretenden sopesar la reaccion de la RPDC con esa provocacion. 
					
					 Por eso, les damos esta respuesta tan clara. 
					
					 Si los belicistas titeres surcoreanos abren primero el fuego desoyendo la advertencia de la RPDC, no podran evitar el castigo mil veces mas temible que lo sufrido en el anterior incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					 Ademas, traeran la ruptura total de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la autodestruccion mas tragica de ellos mismos. 
					
					 La evolucion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana depende enteramente de EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					 La RPDC no vacila ni un comino ante cualquier declaracion de guerra y esta dispuesta a pelear si ellos lo quieren. 
					
					 Ella esta preparada tanto para la guerra local como para la total. 
					
					 Los provocadores lo pagaran muy caro.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
 Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim recorrio los dias 18 y 19 la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					 Las centrales no.1 y no.2 de Huichon, construidas en un corto tiempo a la nueva velocidad de Chollima, la de Huichon, bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente    Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, entraron ahora en la operacion de prueba para suministrar la energia electrica a varios dominios de la economia nacional.
					
					 Recorriendo varios puntos junto con los funcionarios correspondientes, inclusive la sala de generadores donde se escuchaban estruendosos zumbidos de esas maquinas, Choe estudio detalladamente sobre el estado de modernizacion del sistema electrico y el de produccion.
					
					 Se refirio a la importancia de la posicion que tiene la central de Huichon en resolver el problema de electricidad, imprescindible para la construccion del Estado prospero, y destaco la necesidad de normalizar la produccion de electricidades al administrar bien segun la norma tecnica los equipos de la central.
					
					 Subrayo ademas que se tomen en la industria electrica los remedios decisivos para elevar al maximo la capacidad de produccion de las existentes centrales y reducir la derivacion de electricidad durante la transmision.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por dia de nacimiento de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por dia de nacimiento de Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 20 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					 A la recepcion fueron invitados el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun, el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk y otros funcionarios.
					
					 El embajador cubano dijo en la ocasion que los revolucionarios del mundo no olvidaran nunca los trabajos abnegados realizados por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il por el cumplimiento de la causa socialista.
					
					 Subrayo que la guia sabia del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Un es el factor de todas las victorias para la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Deseo de todo corazon que el pueblo coreano abra las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en este ano del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y defienda con firmeza la patria y el socialismo.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam senalo por su parte que la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue la brillante del Gran Hombre quien corono con victorias y glorias la larga trayectoria de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun, trabajando con infinita fidelidad a la idea y la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Continuo que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un presta profunda atencion al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con Cuba en acato al noble proposito del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					 Finalizo que el pueblo coreano seguira consolidando los lazos de amistad combativa y cooperacion entre los dos paises, basados en los principios revolucionarios y la camaraderia.
